title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water according to the package instructions.
Fry the minced beef in a pan until browned.
Add the onions and garlic, cooking until softened.
Stir in the tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and fry the onions and garlic.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the curry powder and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.
